title.narrative: Appui au Renforcement du Système de Santé en RCA (Fonds Bêkou III)

description.narrative: The main aim of this third phase is to continue to strengthen the health system with an integrated approach at the Health District level providing decentralized services offering within the a universal health coverage using a RBF approach. There are 4 specific objectives: - to improve all aspects of health care quality; - to strengthen community participation - to strengthen the technical and financial management capacity of the COGES. In the project, Cordaid will also train and coach the Bêkou Fund health partner organizations (ALIMA, CRF, PUI and IMC) in the process of introducing the PBF approach into their project.

The final beneficiaries is the population (estimated at 469,941 inhabitants in 2018) covered by the 56 health facilities (3 hospitals, 38 Health Centers and 15 health posts), of the 38 health catchment areas of the 3 targeted Health Districts (Bangassou:4 communes and total population 137,345, Ouango-Gambo: 5 communes and total population 88,718 Bossangoa; 6 communes and total population 243 878.

mailing-address.narrative: Grote Marktstraat 45, Den Haag, Zuid Holland, 2511 BH
